name: Fortune Slots: Igrosoft slot machines
description:
Get 7000 credits for FREE after installation!
Fortune Slots presents a world of classic slot machines from the Igrosoft company.
Crazy Monkey, Fruit Cocktail, Resident, Keks, Garage and other popular slots from this manufacturer have already gathered millions of fans from around the world!

Fortune Slots provides:
1. 16 FREE popular slot games
2. Free Tournaments with prizes
3. Ease of use and easy navigation;
4. Wheel of Fortune
5. FREE credits every 4 hours;
6. Bonuses for friends;
7. Super bonus games, the double games and free spins;
8. Ability to compete with other players in the Game Center.

What are you waiting for? Download now and get LUCKY!
-The World Needs More Winners!
